        Return the heuristic cost of a position. the heuristic cost take into consideration if it's faster to cross any world boundaries by effectively creating a 3*3 grid of world to find the closest end point
        Parameters:
        start - the position to be tested
        end - the end position
        world - the world into which the search is made

        the heuristic cost of the node
